text: Ghoghardiha is a city and a notified area in Darbhanga division, Madhubani district in the state of Bihar, India. The old name of this village was Ghoghnarhiya (cow home). Later became Ghoghardiha. ==Demographics== At the 2011 India census, Ghoghardiha had a population of 157,224 (80,796 males and 76,428 females. ==Air Transport== Rajbiraj Airport is the nearest airport roughly 59 km away and can be accessed by Kunauli border. One can easily take erickshaw from border to Airport. Shree Airlines operates daily flights between Rajbiraj and Kathmandu The flight will cost roughly Rs 1,800 INR. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Madhubani district
title: Ghoghardiha
